rows.label: qst002310_msg0001
rows.name:
Everyone, thank you for coming all
this way for Moruru's sake, mo.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0002
rows.name:
This is Moruru...? Is this
really the Nopon who stole
the Platinum Music Box?

rows.label: qst002310_msg0003
rows.name: He doesn't seem like a criminal...

rows.label: qst002310_msg0004
rows.name:
Head of Security Maurcio is
correct, mo. Moruru has
committed many mistakes, mo.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0005
rows.name:
But Sephrian-sama, who spreads the
will of Marveni-sama, has forgiven
even the sinful Moruru, mo.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0006
rows.name:
Moruru has repented
and been reborn, mo.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0008
rows.name:
You must believe in Moruru-san.
As long as one is alive, one
can always start over.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0009
rows.name:
The teachings of Marveni-sama
and Acedia have saved even
a sinner like me.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0010
rows.name:
I want to spread these
wonderful teachings to
more people in the world.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0011
rows.name:
As expected of Sephrian-sama! Moruru
will follow you for life, mo!

rows.label: qst002310_msg0013
rows.name:
...If the virtuous Sephrian-dono
says so, I shall believe this
person one more time.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0014
rows.name:
Thanks to all of you, Moruru
has been set free, mo.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0015
rows.name:
You not only stopped the crime
Moruru was about to commit, but
you also cleared his past sins.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0016
rows.name: Won't you become my disciples as well?

rows.label: qst002310_msg0017
rows.name:
I wanted to train with you,
but it's a shame, mo...

rows.label: qst002310_msg0018
rows.name:
By the way, I hear that Moruru-san
caused you some trouble.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0019
rows.name:
Please accept this apology.
The disciple's failure is the
master's responsibility.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0020
rows.name:
This is useless to me, as I
do not bear arms. Please do
not hesitate to accept it.
